title: Amazing
review: Great western, the pace is great, generally the westerns have a slow pace, but in this one the pace is great. Bale is very good and Russel Crowe is outstanding, one of his best performances, Ben Wade is an enigma

title: Awful
review: Worst marvel movie that i have ever seen, and I am a marvel fanatic, but this one is really bad, can't believe that got nominated to best picture instead of infinity war, the Oscars are a joke
